verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, that after the year was expired, at the time that kings go out to battle, Joab led forth the power of the army, and wasted the country of the children of Ammon, and came and besieged Rabbah. But David tarried at Jerusalem. And Joab smote Rabbah, and destroyed it.
verses.verse_html:
1And it came to pass, that after the year was expired, at the time that kings go out to battle, Joab led forth the power of the army, and wasted the country of the children of Ammon, and came and besieged Rabbah. But David tarried at Jerusalem. And Joab smote Rabbah, and destroyed it. ▼
▼ after…: Heb. at the return of the year

tokens.text: And it came to pass, that after

footnotes.body_text: ▼ after…: Heb. at the return of the year
footnotes.body_html: ▼ after…: Heb. at the return of the year

verses.text_plain: And David took the crown of their king from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and there were precious stones in it; and it was set upon David’s head: and he brought also exceeding much spoil out of the city.
verses.verse_html:
2And David took the crown of their king from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and there were precious stones in it; and it was set upon David’s head: and he brought also exceeding much spoil out of the city. ▼
▼ to weigh: Heb. the weight of

tokens.text: in it; and it was set upon David’s

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to weigh: Heb. the weight of
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to weigh: Heb. the weight of

verses.text_plain: And he brought out the people that were in it, and cut them with saws, and with harrows of iron, and with axes. Even so dealt David with all the cities of the children of Ammon. And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 3And he brought out the people that were in it, and cut them with saws, and with harrows of iron, and with axes. Even so dealt David with all the cities of the children of Ammon. And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines; at which time Sibbechai the Hushathite slew Sippai, that was of the children of the giant: and they were subdued.
verses.verse_html:
4And it came to pass after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines; at which time Sibbechai the Hushathite slew Sippai, that was of the children of the giant: and they were subdued. ▼
▼ arose: or, continued: Heb. stood
 , ▼
▼ Gezer: also called, Gob
 , ▼
▼ Sippai: also called, Saph
 , ▼
▼ the giant: or, Rapha

tokens.text: And it came to pass after this

footnotes.body_html: ▼ arose: or, continued: Heb. stood
▼ Gezer: also called, Gob
▼ Sippai: also called, Saph
▼ the giant: or, Rapha

verses.text_plain: And there was war again with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, whose spear staff was like a weaver’s beam.
verses.verse_html:
5And there was war again with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, whose spear staff was like a weaver’s beam. ▼
▼ Jair: also called, Jaare–oregim

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jair: also called, Jaare–oregim

verses.text_plain: And yet again there was war at Gath, where was a man of great stature, whose fingers and toes were four and twenty, six on each hand, and six on each foot: and he also was the son of the giant.
verses.verse_html:
6And yet again there was war at Gath, where was a man of great stature, whose fingers and toes were four and twenty, six on each hand, and six on each foot: and he also was the son of the giant. ▼
▼ great…: Heb. measure
 , ▼
▼ the son…: Heb. born to the giant, or, Rapha

tokens.text: And yet again there was war
and he also was the son

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the son…: Heb. born to the giant, or, Rapha
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the son…: Heb. born to the giant, or, Rapha

verses.text_plain: But when he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David’s brother slew him.
verses.verse_html:
7But when he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David’s brother slew him. ▼
▼ defied: or, reproached
 , ▼
▼ Shimea: also called Shammah

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Shimea: also called Shammah

verses.text_plain: These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
verses.verse_html: 8These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
